analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x7da77a70449930b77f48314917b26d0d8c8cb51b.sol:
	Contract LEXTokensContract has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x7da77a70449930b77f48314917b26d0d8c8cb51b.sol#202-203)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x7da77a70449930b77f48314917b26d0d8c8cb51b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/27/0x7da77a70449930b77f48314917b26d0d8c8cb51b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x7da77a70449930b77f48314917b26d0d8c8cb51b.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
